Translations.Text: N Öebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ass ideg ara d ias yimir, ass nni, ad xesôen ucmiten
A pwaliv yal lois $ef tgwecrar, yal lois ipwanced ar tezmamt is. Assa, a p$eltem ayen txeddmem
Tagi d tazmamt nne£, tessawal tidep fellawen. Nella Nepjerrid ayen akw txeddmem
Ihi, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Issekcem, Mass nnsen, s aêunu S. Wagi d rrbeê n ûûeê
Wanag wid ijehlen: "day ur awen $ôan ara issekniyen iW? Tesme$wôem iman nnwen, tellam d agdud ibe$wviyen
Mi nnan: "ih, lemâahda n Öebbi, d tidep; imir, ur degs ccekk", tennam: "ur neéôi d acu ay d imir; $uône$ d nnwaya kan, ur nepputebbet
Ad asen d vehôent tucmitin xedmen, ad asen izzi wayen i$ef ttihin
Ad asen Inin: "assa, a kwen Neppu, akken teppum timlilit n wass nnwen agi. Axxam nnwen d times, ur awen illi useîîaô
Ayagi, acku kunwi la tettihim $ef issekniyen n Öebbi. T$uôô ikwen tudert n ddunit. Assa, ur d teff$en segs". Ur isti$fiô êedd fellasen
I Öebbi annuz, Mass igenwan, Mass n tmurt, Mass imavalen
I Neppa akw ayen iufraren, di tmurt akked igenwan. Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
